title: Wanama logo slab serif / typewritter font
content:
does anyone know what font is this? Any similar?  
thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106163726im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wanama_3890.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Newbiedesigns.net casual sans - Pupcat {Mike F}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106163726/http:/typophile.com/node/38044 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Lovely thin geometric "The Importance of Being Ernesto" - Fido {Marcus Piper} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106163726/http:/typophile.com/node/37336 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mariano

comments.content: May be monospaced. The ’W’ and ’M’ are of a different weight.

I take that back. I think it’s hand drawn. It looks like a [Century](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106163726/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=century&sample_text=WANAMA&sample_size=36), but the serifs are unique. Can’t explain why the weight discrepancy, though.
